text: Læa h̄ā kxạllxḥˌ ca thrng xeā thos̄ʹ mnus̄ʹy̒ tām thī̀ phwk k̄heā dị̂ k̄hwnk̄hwāy xeā wị̂ læ̂w phraxngkh̒ ca mị̀ thrng h̄ı̂ h̄elụ̄x wị̂ bn h̄n̂ā p̄hæ̀ndin sụ̀ng s̄ạtw̒ lok t̀āng «tæ̀ẁā phraxngkh̒ thrng prawing welā h̄ı̂ phwk k̄heā cnt̄hụng welā thī̀ t̄hūk kảh̄nd wị̂ khrận meụ̄̀x wāra kảh̄nd k̄hxng phwk k̄heā dị̂ mā t̄hụng meụ̄̀x nận h̄æla thæ̂ cring xạllxḥˌ pĕn p̄hū̂thrng h̄ĕn pwng b̀āw k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ s̄emx
